faculty.address:
Tartu linn, 
Tartu linn, Tartumaa 
EST

description.en:
Various data models: Relational, XML, RDF, Graph and NoSQL
 Database indexing techniques
Query optimization strategies
 Distributed Database systems
Parallel database systems
Cloud-based database systems
Case studies and projects for advanced databases
description.et:
1. Erinevad andmemudelid: relatsioonilised, XML, RDF, Graph ja NoSQL
2. Andmebaaside indekseerimine
3. Päringu optimeerimise strateegiad
4. Andmebaaside hajussüsteemid
5. Paralleelsed andmebaaside süsteemid
6. Pilvepõhised andmebaasid Cloud-based database systems
7. Juhtumianalüüsid ja projektid

objectives.en: The objective of this course is to provide an in-depth understanding of the inside details of database systems, i.e., indexing, query optimization, transaction processing and concurrency management. It will also cover advanced aspects such as distributed databases, distributed transaction management, parallel databases, and NoSQL. Last but not least, the course will present advanced query languages. The aims of this course are to learn the technical details of database systems; to understand how these concepts are implemented in concrete systems; and to get hands-on experience in using a database system.
objectives.et: Käesoleva kursuse eesmärgiks on käsitleda põhjalikult andmebaasisüsteemide ülesehitust sh indekseerimist, päringute optimeerimist, tehingutöötlust ja haldamist. Samuti käsitletakse hajusandmebaase, hajutatud tehingutöötlust, paralleelandmebaase, NoSQL andmebaase. Kursusel õpetatakse andmebaaside tehnilisi detaile, kuidas need kontseptsioonid on konkreetsetes süsteemides rakendatud. Samuti saab tudeng praktilise kogemuse andmebaasidega töötamises.

learning_outcomes.en: On successful completion of this course, students should be able to:
1. Demonstrate knowledge of the different conceptual models of databases systems.
2. Understand the various indexing and query optimization techniques.
learning_outcomes.et: 2. Mõistab erinevaid indekseerimise ja päringute optimeerimise meetodeid

learning_outcomes.en: 3. Demonstrate the understanding for challenges, pros and cons of distributed and parallel database systems.
learning_outcomes.et: 3. Mõistab hajusandmebaaside ja paralleelandmebaaside omadusi, nende eeliseid ja puuduseid

learning_outcomes.en: 4. Understand the technical details, pros and cons for modern NoSQL database systems.
learning_outcomes.et: 4. Mõistab kaasaegsete NoSQL andmebaaside tehnilisi detaile ning eeliseid ja puuduseid

learning_outcomes.en: 5. Demonstrate the ability of building solutions for complex data models and application scenarios.
learning_outcomes.et: 5. Oskab luua uusi lahendusi keerukate andmemudelite ja rakenduste jaoks
